Actions.Name: Get account
Actions.Description: To get information on the account, you can send a request to this endpoint and it will return data on the account.

Actions.Name: Update account
Actions.Description: To update information on the account, you can send a request to this endpoint and it will update data on the account.

Actions.Name: List all CTA overlays
Actions.Description: To get call-to-action overlays via the API, you can use this endpoint

Actions.Name: Create a branded domain
Actions.Description: A domain can be added using this endpoint. You need to send the pixel type and the tag.

Actions.Name: Delete domain
Actions.Description: To delete a domain, you need to send a request to this endpoint.

Actions.Name: List all branded domains
Actions.Description: To get your branded domains codes via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Update a domain
Actions.Description: A branded domain can be updated using this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Delete a link
Actions.Description: To delete a link, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Get a single link
Actions.Description: To get details for a single link via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: List all links
Actions.Description: To get your links via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Shorten a link
Actions.Description: To shorten a single link via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Update a link
Actions.Description: To update a link via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Create a pixel
Actions.Description: A pixel can be created using this endpoint. You need to send the pixel type and the tag.

Actions.Name: Delete pixel
Actions.Description: To delete a pixel via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: List all pixels
Actions.Description: To get your pixels codes via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Update a pixel
Actions.Description: To update a pixel via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: List all plans
Actions.Description: Get a list of all plans on the platform. This endpoint is only accessible by users with admin privileges.

Actions.Name: Subscribe a user to a plan
Actions.Description: To subscribe a user to plan, send a PUT request to this endpoint with the plan id and user id. The type of subscription and the expiration date will need to be specified. If the expiration date is not specified, the date will be adjusted according to the type.

Actions.Name: Create a QR code
Actions.Description: To get create a single QR code via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Delete a QR code
Actions.Description: To delete a single QR code via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Get a single QR code
Actions.Description: To get details for a single QR code via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: List all QR codes
Actions.Description: To get your QR codes via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Update a QR code
Actions.Description: To update a single QR code via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: List all custom splash
Actions.Description: To get custom splash pages via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Create a user
Actions.Description: To create a user, use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Delete a user
Actions.Description: To delete a user, use this endpoint.

Actions.Name: Get a single user
Actions.Description: Get data for a single user.

Actions.Name: List all users
Actions.Description: Get a list of all users on the platform. This endpoint is only accessible by users with admin privileges.
